messages.subject: Re: date masamune
messages.msgSnippet: Here is a Date Masamune site in Japanese: http://www3.ocn.ne.jp/~date/ and a picture of a carving of Masamune:
messages.messageBody:
Here is a Date Masamune site in Japanese:
http://www3.ocn.ne.jp/~date/

and a picture of a carving of Masamune:
http://www.asahi-net.or.jp/~cd4a-yme/tosyoji/takara_f/masamune.htm

I didn't really find much with a search for Masamune on google.co.jp
other than that.

Here's some English:
http://www.samurai-archives.com/masamune.html
http://www.samurai-archives.com/terumune.html
http://www.magweb.com/sample/staisho/sta11dat.htm
http://www.sengoku-expo.net/text/person/E/068.html (It looks like
this page is just a direct translation of something originally
Japanese)


--- In samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com, ICPninja67@a... wrote:
> are there any sites or books dedicated to just him? please let me
know where
> i can find in-depth information about him...
>
> thanks

messages.subject: date masamune

messages.messageBody:
